title: For semi-detached buildings, side margin shall be on one side only
clause_text: For semi-detached buildings, side margin shall be on one side only. Plots for semi-detached buildings shall be in pairs.
section: Marginal Distances and set-back for Residential Buildings and mixed use with Height up to
